text:
Hi all,

Hoping someone can help. I have set up a connection to my HubSpot instance via Qlik's inbuilt API. All of the other tables appear to have dates except the engagements table which is pulling through a long integer. I tried googling and using GPT but I cant seem to correctly convert the number back into a date. The first screenshot is the list engagements node and the second is search companies to show the difference in dates. Any ideas?

In case anyone is interested I managed to engineer a solution I think.

This excel formula, with createdAt being the field in question will produce the date.

=DATE(1970,1,1) + (createdAt/ (1000*86400))

In Qlik its:
Date(Date(MakeDate(1970,1,1))+(createdAt/(1000*86400)),'DD/MM/YYYY')
Hi all, I'm trying to create a Webhooks for user communication subscription and am not sure if I'm selecting the right event type.
I'm creating an app that should listen for any communication subscription change for a user.
Sorry not sure I understand what you're trying to do?
Are you trying to download the files that create your website (templates, modules, etc), or are you trying download the files that have been uploaded from a HubSpot form on your website?

Hi all,

We would like to show a custom popup when the ticket status changes and also we need to fetch custom object data with that form. Can I get any support?

Hi all, I have a generic question about the endpoint
```analytics/v2/reports/forms/total```
I does return data (for example 307 breakdowns).
In my flow i need to know the name of the form, and i go to the <https://api.hubapi.com/forms/v2/forms/{form-guid}>  and form some forms from the previous request i'm getting that form not found.

Does it mean that the form is deleted?

<@U05LW2RC94Z>, anything in particular that you would like to see in video form?
same goes for you <@U0695UMTM2M> :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U0695UMTM2M>  i will go through this url and will see what I can learn thanks :pray: before I start with apis what language should be  prepared with?
I am writing in python. I believe that either Node.js (Javascript with server side framework) or Python are appropriate as they are both supported by the custom workflow engine.

Hi, we have decided to upsert users using our own unique identifier to update contact information. This is because we allow our contacts to change their email. However if a contact comes into HubSpot as a lead and then they create an account with us, when we try to send an api call to upsert, we get an error saying the unique identifier is a duplicate key (even when there is no record with that key in HubSpot) because there already exists a Contact with that email in HubSpot. Is there any way around this? We essentially want to merge the Lead contact with the contact that is coming from our database without using the email as a key. Thank you! (cc:: <@U069JV26UE7> )

Hi! Is there a way to  fetch the historical data of the property (not the historical data of the property in record, but for the property itself).
I use this endpoint PATCH*`/crm/v3/properties/{objectType}/{propertyName}`* in order to update the multiple checkbox property options. Now I would like to fetch the historical data in order to revert back the property how it was before update.
yea the later one , i have certain files that are pdfs that are uploaded for the users to read ,they can download them as well. I want to see how many downloads are happening per file
Currently you can't see the number of downloads

Hi
Any API like onSuccess or any way I can handle my own redirection once booking of meeting is confirmed? Idea is that I donâ€™t want to handle by adding external link on HubSpot service but handle my redirection from client side once call is booked successfully

No I cant , I saw those documents in the files API i can see the document name and its metadata from it , but no metrics like views ,downloads etc .I checked the Analytics API as well but i can see it
correct it's not possible to see this data
